name: Adnimation
author: Adnimation

sections.description:
This plugin inserts the Adnimation code into your website for placing animated ads.
Important: To enjoy animated ads, you need to first register with Adnimation and get approved, then log into your account, generate a code under Implementation, and paste it here below.
sections.installation:
1. Upload wp-adnimation to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to the adnimation setting page and configure the plugin
sections.faq:
How can I Add Adnimation’s Animated Ads to My Website?

It’s easy and quick. Visit http://www.adnimation.com/ to register and follow instructions.

What is Adnimation?

This plugin inserts the Adnimation code into your website for placing animated ads.

How can we use Adnimation?

To enjoy animated ads, you need to first register with Adnimation and get approved, then log into your account, generate a code under Implementation, and paste it here below.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • First version of plugin.

Better Ads for All by Adnimation.
